level.text: 9302.1 Subject to ยง 9301.1, a certification issued pursuant to this chapterhall expire at 11:59 p.m. of October 30 of each odd-numbered year.
9302.2 The Director may modify the renewal system pursuant to ยง 4006.3f chapter 40 of this title and may modify the date on which a certificationxpires.
